patthana22.17:4.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.17:4.2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.17:4.3: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:5.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:6.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:7.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuñca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:7.4: Hetuyā ekavīsa … pe … vipāke cuddasa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.17:8.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.17:9.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana22.17:10.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana22.17:10.2: (Dveyeva. Paṭhamaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, dutiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, tatiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
patthana22.17:10.4: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
